alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 1:20PM EDT until June 03 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GARRETT COUNTY... At 119 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Accident, or near Bittinger, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Mountain Lake Park, Oakland, Bittinger, Loch Lynn Heights, Friendsville, Accident, Hutton, Jennings, Deep Creek Lake State Park, Crellin, Swallow Falls State Park, McHenry, McComas Beach, New Germany and Redhouse. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
